COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, shall we go practice again today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea
STRING: [Torta] “Good work. I have somewhere to go today, so
let's stop for now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20a
STRING: [Chris] “What? Where are you going?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x220
STRING: Torta stopped just outside the school building.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x234
STRING: [Torta] “Shopping. It's not Natale shopping, but there
are some things I ran out of.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x254
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, is it food?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272
STRING: [Torta] “That too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x288
STRING: [Chris] “In that case, I'll go with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ba
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm? You have shopping, too, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d0
STRING: [Chris] “That's right. Will I be in your way?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x302
STRING: [Torta] “I don't mind. Okay, let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x356
STRING: [Torta] “First I'll get some vegetables.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c
STRING: [Chris] “I never thought I'd hear those words from your
mouth, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39e
STRING: [Torta] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b4
STRING: [Chris] “Nothing. Do you know how to choose?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e6
STRING: [Torta] “Yes I know how. All the shopping here is my
job.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x406
STRING: [Chris] “I see. I'm impressed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x438
STRING: [Torta] “For some reason that doesn't make me happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44e
STRING: [Chris] “Ah-ha-ha. Just shop and don't worry about me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x480
STRING: [Torta] “I would think you're the one who doesn't know
how to choose, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a0
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry. It just doesn't seem like you, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e4
STRING: [Torta] “Not like me... We're the same age, right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x512
STRING: Whatever... I'll go buy some.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x536
STRING: Torta went into the store while I waited by the
entrance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54c
STRING: I wouldn't have been much help to her, and I didn't have
anything special to buy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x562
STRING: But I planned to carry her bags at the very least.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58e
STRING: Several minutes later, Torta came out with paper bags
in both hands.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c0
STRING: [Torta] “Oh... Woops.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d6
STRING: [Chris] “Oof.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f4
STRING: I held her up with my hands as she stumbled coming
out of the narrow entrance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x626
STRING: [Torta] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63c
STRING: [Chris] “Are you okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x652
STRING: I took one of the bags and removed the hand
supporting her shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x67a
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x690
STRING: [Chris] “Wow... You bought a lot. Are you finished
shopping now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6cc
STRING: [Torta] “One more thing. I have to buy some meat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e2
STRING: [Chris] “Then didn't you buy too much?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x700
STRING: [Torta] “You're here, Chris. And they gave me a
discount, so I bought kind of a lot of stuff.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x720
STRING: [Chris] “I don't mind you using me, but I'd appreciate it if
you didn't buy so much at the next store.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75c
STRING: [Torta] “I know... You know I won't buy that much meat,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: [Chris] “I guess that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a6
STRING: Just the one bag I took was pretty heavy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b2
STRING: I tried to take the heaviest one, but there probably
wasn't much difference.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c8
STRING: [Chris] “Then let's hurry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e6
STRING: [Torta] “Is it heavy?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fc
STRING: [Chris] “Of course I'm fine. I'm worried about you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x82e
STRING: [Torta] “Oh my, it's rare for you to worry about me like a
girl.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x858
STRING: Torta chuckled in amusement as we walked down the
roofed-over street.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86e
STRING: Such behavior struck me as slightly strange.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87a
STRING: Then I realized the reason right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x886
STRING: [Chris] “You know, you've changed a little, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b8
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm? I've changed?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ce
STRING: [Chris] “Your general air, that kind of thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e4
STRING: Torta said before that my sound had changed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f0
STRING: It was something very emotional, and I didn't
understand it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fc
STRING: But people change over time; Torta and I were the
same in that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x912
STRING: Whether I could call that growth or not, was still a
difficult question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x930
STRING: [Torta] “‘that kind of thing?’ Like what, for example?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x950
STRING: [Chris] “Like maybe looking for discounts when you're
shopping?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x982
STRING: [Torta] “It's true I didn't do much shopping when I was
little...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x998
STRING: [Chris] “Right, and buying enough that you'd get a
discount, that's just like...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d4
STRING: [Torta] “Just like Arie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ea
STRING: [Chris] “I guess...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa08
STRING: [Torta] “I think I might like to know just what your
image of me is, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa28
STRING: [Chris] “You're... You're just Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5a
STRING: [Torta] “But you're saying that's changing, right? Can I
ask what you thought of me before I changed?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7a
STRING: [Chris] “No... Will you forgive me if I refuse?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaac
STRING: [Torta] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac2
STRING: [Chris] “That's what I thought. But I don't mean it in a
bad way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafe
STRING: [Torta] “Then can we go in there for a minute?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb14
STRING: Torta pointed to a piazza in the middle of the main road
and lifted her bag up slightly in front of her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2a
STRING: [Chris] “Let's have a little rest. These are pretty heavy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb48
STRING: [Torta] “That's what I was thinking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: We put our bags down next to the fountain, and sat
down on the rim to take a breather.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb2
STRING: [Torta] “So? What did you think of me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc8
STRING: [Chris] “I already said I didn't mean it in a bad way,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfa
STRING: [Torta] “So go ahead and say it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc10
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... You and Arie are twins, right? I always
kind of felt that you were total opposites.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc44
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5a
STRING: [Chris] “Like for music and cooking, if one of you is good
at it, the other will be poor at it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc82
STRING: [Torta] “Well, I suppose that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc98
STRING: [Chris] “So it's like you each unconsciously took on your
own roles.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd4
STRING: [Torta] “I can agree with that. I thought the same thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfc
STRING: [Torta] “We're identical twins, and since we look almost
the same, a lot of people think we're the same person.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1c
STRING: Torta stared into the distance, and continued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3a
STRING: [Torta] “But I didn't expect you to think so, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd50
STRING: [Chris] “No, I didn't look at you the same. I knew that
Arie was Arie, and Torta was Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8c
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, I know that. So...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda2
STRING: Torta stopped there, and was quiet for a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb8
STRING: [Chris] “So?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdea
STRING: [Torta] “No, it's nothing. We were talking about us
being seen as one person?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe3c
STRING: [Torta] “We both understand that well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5a
STRING: [Torta] “But Arie and I can do different things and have
different personalities, just like you said, Chris. We were
the only ones to understand we're two different
people.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8c
STRING: [Torta] “So we thought we could cover for what the
other couldn't do. We thought that was fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb4
STRING: [Torta] “That... I think that changed after being this far
away and finally being alone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xedc
STRING: [Torta] “I'm like Arie in some ways and Arie is like me in
some ways. The things that stand out are easier to see;
that was just hard to understand.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0e
STRING: [Torta] “I think I'm getting closer to Arie in fulfilling the
parts of me that weren't complete. And maybe Arie is,
too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf42
STRING: Finally Torta laughed lightly to show she had finished
talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf58
STRING: [Chris] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf8a
STRING: [Torta] “So you're not actually wrong to think I had
changed, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfaa
STRING: [Chris] “That does happen sometimes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfdc
STRING: [Torta] “Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff2
STRING: [Chris] “But it might get harder to know if you start to
be similar inside as well as out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102e
STRING: [Torta] “Even so, you'll be able to tell us apart, right
Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1044
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1076
STRING: [Torta] “Saying it like that means you have confidence
for now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1096
STRING: [Chris] “For now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c0
STRING: I repeated what she said, and Torta laughed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e8
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, let's rest and then go. I still have to go to
one more place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1108
STRING: [Chris] “Don't buy too much this time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1126
STRING: [Torta] “I said I wouldn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1192
STRING: [Torta] “I'm home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a8
STRING: I ended up carrying the bag back to Torta's house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b4
STRING: [Chris] “Excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e6
STRING: [Ninna] “Hmm? Is that you, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1218
STRING: [Torta] “I bought a little too much, so he carried half for
me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122e
STRING: [Chris] “As she says.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1260
STRING: [Ninna] “Oh dear, thank you. Will you have dinner while
you're here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1280
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, no. I just went shopping with Torta today...
I may visit soon, possibly on Natale.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c6
STRING: [Torta] “I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12dc
STRING: [Chris] “I mean, we have to practice, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130e
STRING: [Torta] “Oh my... That's rare.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1324
STRING: [Chris] “Ummm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1356
STRING: [Torta] “I'm actually complimenting you. But I want to
go out a little too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1376
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sure I'll go pray.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a8
STRING: [Torta] “In that case, we should go together.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13be
STRING: [Chris] “Right, we could go during a break from practice,
or before we start.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13fa
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, keep the twenty-fifth open.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1410
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. Ninna, see you again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142e
STRING: [Ninna] “Yes. I'll have something tasty waiting for you on
that day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144e
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1480
STRING: [Torta] “You really need to stop with the formal speech.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a0
STRING: [Chris] “I'm fine like this. Well then, I'll be going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c8
STRING: [Ninna] “Right, thank you for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f2
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152a
STRING: I would spend Natale with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1536
STRING: It would be my first time since coming to Piova.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1542
STRING: My normal Natale custom was for Arie to visit and for us
to go to church and eat together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1562
STRING: But Arie said she couldn't come, and since I had to
practice, it wasn't so strange for me to spend Natale
with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158a
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1596
STRING: This year was different, for a lot of reasons.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a2
STRING: It would be good if nothing changed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ae
STRING: While I was thinking that, the situation kept changing
every day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ba
STRING: Arie was changing, and Torta was changing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c6
STRING: Even though it would be good if nothing changed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d2
STRING: Thinking this once more, I walked home in the rain.
